example: Childhood obesity has become a serious public health issue.
Good nutrition supports physical growth and mental performance.
A balanced diet helps prevent chronic diseases.
Regular exercise improves stamina and reduces stress.
Many people join gyms to improve their fitness.

meaning: sức khỏe tinh thần và thể chất
example: Work-life balance contributes to overall well-being.
Mental health awareness has increased in recent years.
High stress levels can lead to burnout and insomnia.
Anxiety can affect concentration and daily functioning.
Affordable healthcare is essential for social equality.
Vaccination prevents the spread of infectious diseases.
A strong immunity helps the body fight infections.
Chronic disease often requires long-term treatment.
Early treatment increases the chance of recovery.
Prevention is cheaper than cure in most cases.
Medical research has improved survival rates for many cancers.
Some medicines cause side effects like dizziness.
Addiction can harm both individuals and their families.
Life expectancy tends to rise with better healthcare access.
Rehabilitation helps patients regain mobility after injury.
